Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-6197 affecting package curl for versions less than 8.8.0-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-6197 affecting package curl for versions less than 8.8.0-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package curl is earlier than 8.8.0-2, affected by CVE-2024-6197
